title: Good PC but low fps
body:
Hey guys i've got a new pc week ago but i have very low fps in league (about 40) and its dropin in teamfights i have the newest drivers so i dont think this is the problem and even when i change the settings to very low its still low.I have about 30 ms(ping).
PC specs:
Processor: AMD FX 6300 six core 3.5 ghz
RAM: 8 GB
Video card: AMD Radeon r7 240 2GB
i really think that i should have better fps.:)

replies.body: FPS issues are usually due to game files not being rendered properly as a result of corrupt game files, outdated drivers, or something else.  As a first step, I suggest using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your drivers and look for issues that could be causing this.  Hopefully this will get you all fixed up!

I've also been having FPS issures. I'm running a high end pc with terrible FPS consistency . Been playing league for years now and never experienced this. My Fps used to never drop from 144. Now it goes from 144 to 68, 32, 122.....? I've tried everything for almost a month now, Please help!
Does it continue if you lower your graphics settings?

Yes even when i lower the settings it's still low but before i day i turned the shadows to low and now i have 110 fps at the start of the game but in late game sometimes  it drops back to 40-60 and its kinda bad.i have the lastest drivers for my AMD card- AMD Radeon Crimson 16.7.3 and directx 9.0 :) ty for the fast reply m8 :)
Do you have vSync disabled or not? Try disabling it, that can often help, regardless of specs.
I have turned it off and there's no fps drops in other games :/
Yeah. if i lower the graphics and fps i still have issues. not as bad but it not be consistent fps

Try rolling back your driver to a previous or recent older version.
Also, do you have problems with fps drops in other games, or only League?
